name: Curse Cultivation
author: 烛天动漫
content: You don’t belong to this world, and yet you wish to step onto the path of cultivation. Targeted by the Heavens, they cast a curse on you, one unbreakable even by immortals. All changes in your body will be reversed, and you will no longer be able to cultivate again.Jiang Chen tries to cultivate, but realises that his spiritual energy flows backwards, and scatters in all directions.When he was in despair, he was struck by lightning.[You’ve been struck by lightning, your flesh and blood is eroded
